name: Destruction
description: Destruction is a game that destroys enemies up to 25 stages. A variety of powerful enemies will attack you. Don't let your guard down and use three modes and a variety of skills to destroy your enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card Storage: 143 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
